item.title: Developing and Deploying a Portfolio.
item.description: Task 2: Building My Portfolio Website with Hugo In this task, I was given to create my own portfolio website using Hugo, a powerful open-source website generator. It was a great experience, and I got to learn many things . Installing HUGO and Creating Server To install HUGO in my Ubuntu, I refered Install Linux Guide .So I ran following commands in the terminal; It created a local server for me to use and customize the portfolio.
